components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to the MTN Network in Benin

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MTN Network in Benin. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue related to SMS delivery delays. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Message Status Update Failures Affecting MMS Messages for a Subset of Customers

The Telefonica 02 network in Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 04 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 05 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Telefonica 02 Germany handsets when sending via SMS.

Our SMS carrier partner in Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from October 05 2023 at 01:00 PDT until October 05 2023 at 02:00 PDT . During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Germany handsets via Germany shortcode.

The Etisalat network in Egypt is conducting an emergency maintenance from 05 October  2023 at 17:00 PDT until 05 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Etisalat Egypt handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 October 2023 at 13:15 PDT until 07 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes
